body_html: It would certainly be possible to handle this by handling IndexedSlices in a similar manner to SparseTensor in Session.run(), using the subfeed/subfetch mechanism. We'd be happy to take contributions on this!
body_text: It would certainly be possible to handle this by handling IndexedSlices in a similar manner to SparseTensor in Session.run(), using the subfeed/subfetch mechanism. We'd be happy to take contributions on this!
body: It would certainly be possible to handle this by handling `IndexedSlices` in a similar manner to `SparseTensor` in `Session.run()`, using the subfeed/subfetch mechanism. We'd be happy to take contributions on this!
